title: Group Therapy: How Do I Confront A Friend Who's Hitting On Other Men?
description: Leanne called into the show this morning regarding one of her friends in their close wives friend group. This particular friend likes to hit on the other wives husbands. She's not sure if she should confront her one on one, get everyone else to join, or what?
